sys_ux_client_script.name: handle_pagination

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_18c1c285ac65311046b4bf1387c4c498
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">54c1c2854b653110b56cbbe8be05b098</macroponent><name>handle_pagination</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
	const props = api.context.props;
	const fields = {
		searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId,
		searchTerm: props.searchTerm
	};
	const token = event.payload.paginationToken;
	const params = {
		searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
		facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
		disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck,
		paginationToken: token
	};
	global.window.scrollTo(0, 0);
	helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-26 09:51:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>18c1c285ac65311046b4bf1387c4c498</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_pagination</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LOS POC" source="x_1070677_los_po_0">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LOS POC">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_18c1c285ac65311046b4bf1387c4c498</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-26 09:51:37</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
